actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 35 of title 38, United States Code, in order to permit eligible persons to pursue a course of education in a vocational or technical school in a foreign country under certain circumstances.

summary.text: Permits eligible veterans to pursue vocational or technical educational courses in a foreign country if such course or courses are not offered in the United States or not immediately available to a prospective student, and such course or courses meet the standards set by the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1723(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 35 of title 38, United States Code, in order to permit eligible persons to pursue a course of education in a vocational or technical school in a foreign country under certain circumstances.
